remove_non_ascii[source]

remove_non_ascii(s)

Remove non ascii chars from the given string Args: s: string: The string to remove chars from Returns: string: The result string with non-ascii chars removed

Hat tip: http://stackoverflow.com/a/1342373/2367526

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fuzzy_match[source]

fuzzy_match(s1, s2, max_dist=0.8)

Fuzzy match the given two strings with the given maximum distance jellyfish jaro_winkler_similarity based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jaro-Winkler_distance Args: s1: string: First string s2: string: Second string max_dist: float: The distance - default: 0.8 Returns: True if the match is greater equals max_dist. Otherwise false
